org.spongepowered.api.block.data

Interface Sign

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSerializable, TileEntity

    public interface Sign
extends TileEntity
    Represents for a Sign.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getLines

        Message[] getLines()
        Gets all lines of text on the sign.
        Returns:
        The lines of text

      • setLines

        void setLines(Message... lines)
        Sets the lines of text on the sign. Any lines past the maximum number of lines displayable on the sign will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        lines - The new lines

      • getLine

         throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Gets the line at the given index.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The line of text
        Throws:

             Message text)
      throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

        text - The new text
        Throws:
